effect.black_white: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.black_2_white_2: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.

short_effect.black_white: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target’s.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target’s.
